title: Jiale Zhao
text: Hi! I'm Jiale Zhao, a computer science graduate (B.Eng., 2025) from Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications. I currently work on rubrics-based reinforcement learning (RL) for large language models during my internship at Li Auto.

title: Jiale Zhao
text: Sep 2023 – Present: Algorithm Intern, Li Auto, Large Language Model Group. Sep 2021 – Jun 2025: B.Eng. in Computer Science, Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications. Fall 2026 (planned): PhD studies, applications in progress.
